Class SesameQueryUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.clarkparsia.openrdf.query.SesameQueryUtils

public final class SesameQueryUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of utility methods for working with the OpenRdf Sesame Query API.

asGraph

public static ExtGraph asGraph(GraphQueryResult theResult)
                        throws QueryEvaluationException
Create a Sesame graph from the GraphQueryResult. If the invocation is successful, the query result is closed before returning the result.

Parameters:
theResult - the result of the query
Returns:
the graph built from the result
Throws:
QueryEvaluationException - if there was an error while creating the graph from the query result

parse

public static ParsedQuery parse(java.lang.String theQuery)
                         throws MalformedQueryException
Return a parsed query object from the query string

Parameters:
theQuery - the query string to parse
Returns:
the parsed query object
Throws:
MalformedQueryException - if the query string is not in a known query format.

escape

public static java.lang.String escape(java.lang.String theString)
Properly escape out any special characters in the query string. Replaces unescaped double quotes with \" and replaces slashes '\' which are not a valid escape sequence such as \t or \n with a double slash '\\' so they are unescaped correctly by a SPARQL parser.

Parameters:
theString - the query string to escape chars in
Returns:
the escaped query string

setLimit

public static void setLimit(ParsedQuery theQuery,
                            int theLimit)
Set the value of the limit on the query object to a new value, or specify a limit if one is not specified.

Parameters:
theQuery - the query to alter
theLimit - the new limit

setOffset

public static void setOffset(ParsedQuery theQuery,
                             int theOffset)
Set the value of the limit on the query object to a new value, or specify a limit if one is not specified.

Parameters:
theQuery - the query to alter
theOffset - the new limit

closeQuietly

@Deprecated
public static void closeQuietly(info.aduna.iteration.CloseableIteration<?,? extends java.lang.Exception> theResults)
Deprecated. 

Close the iteration, ignoring any thrown exception and instead just logging it.

Parameters:
theResults - the iteration to close

optimize

public static <T extends ParsedQuery> T optimize(T theQuery)
Apply a set of built-in sesame query optimizers to the given Query object. This reflects most of the optimizations applied to queries by the standard Sesame MemoryStore.

Parameters:
theQuery - the query to optimize
Returns:
the query after optimization

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
